Posts.Content: yes it is. I went back for my second mammo thinking nothing of it because I've had cyst show up before. But right away I knew it wasn't cyst when she showed it too me. I'm going to try and stay busy with the granddaughters this weekend to keep my mind off of it. I'll watch for your post to see what your results were. fingers crossed for you.....lala
Posts.Title: Stereotactic Breast Biopsy 1 2

Posts.Content: getting my results today. They are supposed to call at 3:30. I know the odds are in my favor but boy these last hours are the worst!
Posts.Title: Stereotactic Breast Biopsy 1 2

Posts.Content: I go in Tuesday afternoon for this biospy. They told me they would give me a Valium so I needed a driver. I am sure it will help me get through it. It seems like if anything happens, it happens to me. So I am hoping for the best but trying to be prepared for the worse. I can't help but be scared, cancer is such a scary word.
Posts.Title: Stereotactic Breast Biopsy 1 2

Posts.Content: I am fine, the results showed no cancer. Now its been a week and I still have a rather large hematoma in my breast from the biopsy. How long before it goes away? It is rather painful.
Posts.Title: Stereotactic Breast Biopsy 1 2

Posts.Content: I had mine today. I will know the results on Thursday or Friday. Did willo get her results yet?
Posts.Title: Stereotactic Breast Biopsy 1 2

Posts.Content: just go to another clinic/doctor...at the same time continue avoiding the meats that the first doc recommended. Do not take it lightly. I know a man who had breast cancer. He has been cancer free for four years now, I think he said he has one more year of the medicine to take. good luck.
Posts.Title: Small firm lump - 18 yr old male

Posts.Content: I had that and had my biopsy today. They wanted me in right away for the biopsy. I'd ask the doctor why should you wait for so long? What makes your different than mine. The doc that did the biopsy says that 20% is cancer. I wouldn't want to take that chance. Having said that It is only right that I had there are two types of calcification, macro and micro. Macro is less chance of being cancer by a long ways, micro is 20% chance if it is a small area and not just dotted here and there in the breast. talk to your doctor.
Posts.Title: Breast calcification - age 44
